info.description: E-commerce API built with Go Fiber and Clean Architecture
info.title: Go Commerce API

get.description: Get all addresses for the authenticated user with pagination. Requires authentication.

post.description: Create a new address for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.

get.description: Get the default address for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get a single address by its ID (owner only). Only address owner can access.

put.description: Update an existing address (owner only). Only address owner can update.

delete.description: Delete an existing address (owner only). Only address owner can delete.

put.description: Set an address as default for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Force deactivate a product for violations, reports, etc. Admin can suspend any product without seller permission.
Reactivate a suspended product. Admin can unsuspend any product to make it active again.

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.
Register a new user with email, password, and profile information. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

get.description: Get all product categories with pagination. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

post.description: Create a new product category (admin only). For root category, omit parent_id or set to null. For subcategory, provide parent_id.

get.description: Get a single category by its ID. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

delete.description: Physical delete of category (admin only). Only allowed if never used by any product in history

403.description: Forbidden - admin only or category has been used

put.description: Activate a category following business rules: cannot activate if parent is inactive (admin only)
Deactivate a category following business rules: cannot deactivate if has active children or used by active products (admin only)

409.description: Conflict - category has active children or used by active products

get.description: Check if the server is running and database is connected
Get basic application metrics and version information
Get all products with pagination and filtering. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

parameters.description: Sort by: newest, oldest, price_asc, price_desc, popular, name_asc, name_desc
parameters.name: sort_by

post.description: Create a new product for the authenticated user's store. Only store owners can create products.

get.description: Get all products owned by the authenticated user with pagination and search. Only store owners can access their products.
Search products by partial slug match with pagination. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.
Get a single product by its exact slug. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.
Get products filtered by status with pagination

parameters.description: Product status: active, inactive, or suspended
parameters.name: status

get.description: Get a single product by its ID. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

put.description: Update an existing product. Only the product owner can update their products.

delete.description: Delete an existing product. Only the product owner can delete their products.

put.description: Activate a product following business rules: store and category must be active, stock must be > 0. Only product owner can activate.

403.description: Forbidden - store inactive or not product owner

409.description: Conflict - already active, category inactive, or out of stock

put.description: Deactivate a product. Only product owner can deactivate their products.

post.description: Upload a photo for a product. Only the product owner can upload photos.

delete.description: Delete a photo from a product. Only the product owner can manage photos.

put.description: Set a photo as the primary photo for a product. Only the product owner can manage photos.

get.description: Get all provinces in Indonesia. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.
Get all cities in a specific province. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.
Get all stores with pagination and search. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

post.description: Create a new store for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.

get.description: Get store information for the authenticated user. Only store owners can access their store.

put.description: Update store information for the authenticated user. Only store owners can update their store.

get.description: Get a single store by its ID. This is a public endpoint accessible to everyone.

post.description: Create a new transaction with multiple items (atomic operation). Requires authentication.

get.description: Get current user's transaction history with pagination. Requires authentication.
Get a specific transaction by ID (ownership validation). Only transaction owner can access.

put.description: Change current user password. Requires authentication.

get.description: Get current user profile information. Requires authentication.

put.description: Update current user profile information. Requires authentication.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
